content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
using Printf

function wordwrap(s::String, text_width::Int=76)
    split = split(s)
    w = text_width
    out = ""
    for i in split
        pushfirst!((outlen(out) + length(i) + ifelse(out == "", 0, 1)) < w ? lpad([out, i], w, " "), out))
    end
    out
end
```
